name: The Legendary Merchant
description:
Buy the cargo and load it onto the ship. 

Carry the cargo from the island on the left to the island on the right. 

Great. The cargo will sell for double the price.

Next is left from right.

OK. Trade is a repetition of the process. Good luck.

Controls
  1. mouse drag to load cargo
  2. mouse down to advance the ship.
Trijam #163

THE THEME is: Buy and sell!
